txt.en: Serric has asked you to reduce the cave-claw infestation in the nearby mountains.\n\nCave-claws have been spotted at the foot of the mountainside west of Ost Arndír.
'You did it? Oh, thank you so much. Ugh, those creatures make my stomach turn.'
You should let Serric know that you have lessened the number of cave-claws at Rasping-crag.\n\nSerric is in Ost Arndír.

'Someone needs to do something! I just got back from trying to gather firewood in the woods west of the city and you will not believe what I found. Cave-claws! They've burst through the mountainside and are infesting the forest. Someone needs to take care of those vermin before they multiply! Before they come down into Ost Arndír itself!'\n\nSerric shudders at the thought and looks at you impatiently.
Chittering and feral growls have been heard in a once-quiet forest outside of Ost Arndír.
'You did it? Oh, thank you so much. Ugh, those creatures make my stomach turn.'
'Someone needs to do something! You will not believe what I found!'
